control.name: ceCustomize
control.description: Hides or displays the Quick Customize Button.

control.name: ceSorting
control.description: Specifies whether end-users can sort data by column values.

control.name: ceFiltering
control.description: Displays the Filter button within the column header. Click the 'Customize' button to filter data using the filter dropdowns.

control.name: ceImage
control.description: Specifies whether images are displayed within card captions.

control.name: ceButtons
control.description: Specifies whether cards should display their expand buttons.

control.name: seMaxColumns
control.description: Sets the maximum number of card columns which can be displayed simultaneously within a View.

control.name: seMaxRows
control.description: Sets the maximum number of card rows.

control.name: ceAutoHorzWidth
control.description: When enabled, end-users cannot change the card width using the card separator no matter whether or not the Sizeable option is enabled.

control.name: ceMultiSelect
control.description: Specifies whether multiple card selection is enabled and selects specific cards.

control.name: sbRecords
control.description: Returns the handles of selected rows or cards.
